alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:35AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hamilton, Echols, west central Ware and Clinch Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1033 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers and strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hahira to 14 miles south of Quitman. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Homerville, Jennings, Argyle, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Du Pont, Mayday, Crossroads and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware
